properties.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 11 at 9:27PM PST until January 14 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6
inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6
inches in the valleys with up to 20 inches possible in the
mountains. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph.


* WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening
commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant
snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue
to monitor the latest forecasts.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON
